casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Jesse WILLIAMS No. 60P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2017 Ann B. Petersen, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, for Williams, Jesse. James R. Glover, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill. David Kirkman, Assistant Attorney General, Amy Kunstling Irene, Special Deputy Attorney General, J. Douglas Henderson, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 21st of February 2017 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of May 2017."
